channel.title: Dumper GUI (Item bonus, packer, item examine)
channel.description:
[CENTER]Hello, Hey some of you guys are still having problems with dumping information from runewiki. So I made this GUI based on request from Tyler aka Skrillex.
This is my first attempt so it's the first version. Soon more will come out with different features.
Important things needed to be known: -When using the GUI, please use the batch runner or If you started dumping, It wont close till all finished unless you end the task via Task manager!
-You must place the cache in the data/cache folder or it wont dump!
-All the dumps will be in the dumps folder not in data.
-The examine dump is not perfect, It will sometimes dump html codes so you can delete those dumped items.
Link - [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?e5cb7mfpgsbxipa]Click here[/url]
Cache links: 666 - [url=http://fathienblade.org/forum/files/fathien666.zip]Click here[/url] 667 - [url=http://fathienblade.org/forum/files/fathien667.zip]Click here[/url]
Media: [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/2mgqngn.png[/img] [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/qowp61.png[/img] [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/2lax5kj.png[/img] [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/24luhbr.png[/img]
Credits: Me - GUI Tyler (aka Skrillex) - Providing the needed materials.
Hope you guys enjoy this GUI.[/CENTER]

@Aotearoa wrote:

can some one please tell me the full complete detailed reason what this is for please use noob terminology as lol reading some the comments got me scratching my head like dafaq lawl :3 thank you please quote also so i get a notification

Thanks aotearoa.

[quote=“sonicforce41, post:20, topic:417661”]It gets name from the cache for each item and then goes to http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/itemName.

It’s the same thing from RuneEscape source’s.[/quote]Oh I see. There are lots of cases where that wont work (like disambiguations or items with the same time), but ok

item.title: Dumper GUI (Item bonus, packer, item examine)
item.dc:creator: @sonicforce41 sonicforce41
item.description:
@sonicforce41 wrote:

[quote=“Fridder, post:5, topic:417661”][quote author=sonicforce41 link=topic=520214.msg3777654#msg3777654 date=1318206857]
It dumps to .txt and when you use bonus packer, It packs to .ib extention. That is what RuneEscape uses.
[/quote]

Could you make it dump for .xml files, in the RuneSource format?
I’d give you a fucking french tugboat for that.[/quote]

It only dumps bonuses and examine. You can probably create a dump that can do that.

Read full topic
